timeline.message: ReturnRequestIdHeaderInterceptor to request server put x-ms-client-request-id in response

timeline.bodyText: Might better default true or just remove this boolean.
timeline.author: ChenTanyi

replies.bodyText: One reason customer need the "x-ms-client-request-id" is to cross-check with service when something went wrong. If we send "x-ms-return-client-request-id=true" but service does not return request id, it might be an indicate that service does not handle "x-ms-client-request-id".
replies.author: weidongxu-microsoft

timeline.message: improve doc, use enum for readability
